hadiths.text: Narrated Qatadah: From Anas: "The sandals of the Prophet (ﷺ) had two straps." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih. He said: There are narrations on this topic from Ibn 'Abbas, and Abu Hurairah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي نَعْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Sandals Of The Prophet (ﷺ)
